metadata.name: Achievement Randomizer
metadata.description:
[h1][b]Achievement Randomizer[/b][/h1]
Achievement Randomizer is a mod that gives you the experience of playing through the game from scratch, unlocking each item one by one in a randomized way.
This does [b]not[/b] use the vanilla achievements; it provides a completely customized experience. For a full explanation, check out [url=https://github.com/Zamiell/isaac-achievement-randomizer/blob/main/docs/about.md]the manual on GitHub[/url].
For technical support or general questions, please [b]do not post a comment here[/b]. Instead, post in the "#randomizer-general" channel on the [url=https://discord.gg/GwhUeQjHTF]Isaac streaking Discord server[/url]. To report bugs, please post in the "#randomizer-bugs" channel.
